data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maracana have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 5, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense drive upfield and Wellington Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
In the minute 7, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Pedro Henrique's header is off-target for Paranaense.
In the minute 7, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Leo Cittadini puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 10, That's a fine assist from Vinicius Abner.
Fluminense have been awarded a penalty in Rio de Janeiro...
Thiago Heleno for Paranaense has been booked by Ramon Abatti Abel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 14, Fluminense are awarded a penalty ... Nene botches the spot kick!
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Paranaense.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Fluminense's Nene gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 17, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 23, Free kick Fluminense.
Goal! Nene levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Marcos Paulo to set up the goal.
In the minute 29, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Fluminense throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Fluminense.
At Estadio do Maracana, Wellington for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 30, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Renato Kayzer (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Michel Araujo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense's Luccas Claro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Paranaense.
In the minute 37, Free kick Fluminense.
Thiago Heleno has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Michel Araujo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 39, Ze Ivaldo is replacing Wellington for the away team.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 41, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 42, Fluminense's Michel Araujo is back in action after a slight knock.
Matheus Ferraz is booked for the home team.
Ze Ivaldo (Paranaense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 45, Nene for Fluminense drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In Rio de Janeiro, Wellington Silva of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio do Maracana.
Hudson (Fluminense) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fluminense push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Marcos Paulo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Paranaense defence.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 48, Marcos Paulo of Fluminense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense's Egidio has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 50, Nene gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Luccas Claro (Fluminense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 51, Ramon Abatti Abel awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 54, Fluminense drives forward and Marcos Paulo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 56, Fluminense's Luccas Claro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fluminense are pushing forward but Michel Araujo's finish is wide of the goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Ganso is on a sub for Michel Araujo for Fluminense.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a second substitution, with Felippe Cardoso replacing Wellington Silva.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Hudson (Fluminense) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Paranaense defenders.
Maycon Nikao is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 64, Free kick Fluminense.
Walter (Paranaense) has replaced the possibly injured Maycon Nikao at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 66, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense pushes forward through Nene, whose finish on goal is saved.
Important block from the Paranaense defence as Ganso fires in a strike for Fluminense.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Felippe Cardoso's header is off-target for Fluminense.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Renato Kayzer with Fernando Canesin. This is the third substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 72, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jaime Alvarado is replacing Carlos Eduardo for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Marcos Paulo scores to make it 2-1 at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 75, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Goal! Fluminense extend their lead to 3-1 through Marcos Paulo.
Egidio with an assist there.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Richard (Paranaense) has received a yellow card from Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 83, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Luiz Henrique replacing Nene.
Ramon Abatti Abel waits before resuming play because Pedro Henrique for Paranaense is still down.
Fluminense are coming forward and Marcos Paulo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Paranaense have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Pedro Henrique for Paranaense is back on the field again.
In the minute 88, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Marcos Paulo with Miguel. This is the fourth substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
The home team replace Hudson with Andre.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Paranaense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
